title: mahiSAsura mardinIm namAmi
sahitya:
mahiSAsura mardinIm namAmi mahanIya kapardinIm


anupallavi

 mahiSa mastaka naTana bhEda vinOdinIm mOdinIm 
mAlinIm mAninIm praNata jana saubhAgya dAyinIm


caraNam   shankha cakra shUlAnkusha pANIm shakti sEnAm madhura
vANIm pankaja nayanAm pannagavENIm pAlita guruguhAm 
purANIm shankarArddha sharIriNIm samasta dEvatA rUpiNIm 
kankaNAlankrtAbja karAm kAtyAyanIm nArAyaNIm
